{{ displayName[0] }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IVacancy } from '../interfaces/vacancy'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AccountService } from '../services/account.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-bar', templateUrl: './nav-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-bar.component.scss'], }) export class NavBarComponent implements OnInit { token: string | null = ''; displayName: string | null = ''; constructor(private router: Router, private accService: AccountService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.token = localStorage.getItem('TOKEN'); this.displayName = localStorage.getItem('DisplayName'); console.log(this.token); console.log(this.displayName); } updateData() { if (this.router.url.includes('catalog')) { this.router.navigate(['catalog']).then(() => { window.location.reload(); }); } } }
